EmailTemplate.description: To Contact when Order is created
EmailTemplate.name: To Contact when Order is created
EmailTemplate.subject: Order Submitted To 10K Store
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.Name}:
Thank you for your order from the 10K Store.
{!Order__c.Name}
You can expect shipment for your order at the end of the calendar quarter.
Should you wish to cancel your order, please contact Delivery@10kview.com
10K Delivery
